title: Loving a Woman is Like Winning The Lottery
description: Lena's two best friends, a lesbian couple, have been trying to get her to branch out and go on dates with girls. She finds herself attracted to them, but she doesn't know if she wants to risk all of the drama and heartache that comes from society surrounding homosexuals. When she meets Parker and finally gets a wake up call, she will have to decide what path to take or possibly lose the girl that could change her life forever.
author: S.B. Sheeran
